references.paper_title: A New Approach to Linear Filtering and Prediction Problems
references.reason: This paper introduces the Kalman filter, a fundamental algorithm in signal processing and control theory, which is a core component of the KalmanNet model presented in the study.

references.paper_title: A high-performance neural prosthesis enabled by control algorithm design
references.reason: This paper demonstrates a high-performance neural prosthesis using advanced control algorithms, providing a benchmark for comparison with the KalmanNet approach in terms of performance and efficiency.

references.paper_title: Real-time brain-machine interface in non-human primates achieves high-velocity prosthetic finger movements using a shallow feedforward neural network decoder
references.reason: This study directly compares the performance of a feed-forward neural network decoder against Kalman filters for online brain-machine interface (BMI) control; providing context for the KalmanNet's relative success.

references.paper_title: Balancing memorization and generalization in RNNs for high performance brain-machine interfaces
references.reason: This paper explores the use of recurrent neural networks (RNNs) in BMIs, which provides background for the RNN component within the KalmanNet architecture.

references.paper_title: Kalman-Net: Neural Network Aided Kalman Filtering for Partially Known Dynamics
references.reason: This paper introduces the KalmanNet algorithm, the central focus of the current research, which is a novel approach that combines deep learning techniques with Kalman filtering for improved performance and explainability.
